function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Enforcement of sanctions for non-compliance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Self-reported behavior studies may not capture the full extent of compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on de-identified cell-phone data to assess compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive studies on compliance factors for covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social distancing measures not being followed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay-at-home orders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in sustaining long-term compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High stability of sars-cov-2 and sars-cov-1 in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus titer reduction on different surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exponential decay in virus titer across experimental conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in experimental data especially on cardboard surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 aerosol stability","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Surface stability of sars-cov-2 on plastic and steel","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of sars-cov-2 with sars-cov-1","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of recommendations from global conferences on economic crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to transform crisis into an opportunity for social and environmental reimagining","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of global leadership in coordinating a response to the crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective regulation of supply chains and global corporations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rebuilding public healthcare infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of global leadership in responding to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Undermining of the who and inadequate global responses to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Over-exploitation of forest and other ecologies leading to imbalance in nature","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited civil liberties due to containment measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Authoritarian measures in response to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of neoliberalism as a remedy to pandemic-related failures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gig workers continue to work despite covid-19 symptoms, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequalities in employment standards for gig workers exacerbate existing disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fragmentation of employment services and vocational training creates challenges for displaced workers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of temporary migrants from economic stimulus and welfare packages","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Creation of an underclass of migrant workers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited utility of new policy measures for temporary migrants","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal impact of government measures on young workers and immigrants","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of migrant workers to exploitation and abuse","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusionary migration policy exacerbating socio-economic disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise of insecure work arrangements including casual, fixed term, and market-mediated arrangements","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High unemployment rates and long-term unemployment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hysteresis in the labor market","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in people queuing in front of centrelink offices","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Job losses of 14%-25% with low-income workers twice as likely to be affected","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Systematic flaws in the operation of state enforcement regimes, resulting in widespread employer non-compliance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of concerted and coordinated global effort","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"}]}
